title: Camera footage from robots used in response to Lower Manhattan parking garage collapse

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

All video files recorded by the robotic "dog" and other robots and drones used to respond to a recent parking garage collapse in Lower Manhattan. The operation was described in this recent post by the agency. https://www.instagram.com/p/CrYdYHSuWhZ/?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y%3D

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh

title: Incident reports and other data gathered by robotics use in response to parking garage collage

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

All photographs, incident reports, analysis and summaries generated by the April 18, 2023 use of "Bergh" and other robotic devices to respond to a parking garage collapse in Lower Manhattan.  The effort was described in this post by the department. https://www.instagram.com/p/CrYdYHSuWhZ/?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y%3D

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh

title: FDNY contracts with Boston Dynamics and other robotics makers

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: FDNY contracts with Boston Dynamics and other robotics makers
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

A list of all contracts, agreements and memorandum pertaining to the FDNY's acquisition of robotic devices from Boston Dynamics and other robotics makers

The program and devices have been covered widely in the media, including in the following department post: https://twitter.com/nycgov/status/1651347923740024832/photo/1

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh
